pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services

Class CalculatorsServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services.CalculatorsServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculatorsService

    @Service
public class CalculatorsServiceImpl
extends Object
implements CalculatorsService
    Service class for managing calculations.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

        Description copied from interface: CalculatorsService

        Specified by:

        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - A JSONException is thrown when downloaded string can't be parsed to the JSONArray
